Quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe
Quotes.quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.

Quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
Quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

Quotes.author: Albert Einstein
Quotes.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.

Quotes.author: Desmond Tutu
Quotes.quote: When the missionaries came to Africa they had the Bible and we had the land. They said 'Let us pray.' We closed our eyes. When we opened them we had the Bible and they had the land.

Quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch
Quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.

Quotes.author: William W. Purkey
Quotes.quote: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening And live like it's heaven on earth.

Quotes.author: Dr. Seuss
Quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

Quotes.author: Mae West
Quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

Quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
Quotes.quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.

Quotes.author: Albert Camus
Quotes.quote: Don’t walk in front of me… I may not follow. Don’t walk behind me… I may not learn. Walk beside me… just be my friend

Quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
Quotes.quote: Friendship ... is born at the moment when one man says to another "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .

Quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard
Quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.

Quotes.author: Billy Connolly
Quotes.quote: Before you judge a man, walk a mile in his shoes. After that who cares?... He’s a mile away and you’ve got his shoes!

Quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
Quotes.quote: Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt.

Quotes.author: Alexander Woollcott
Quotes.quote: All the things I really like to do are either immoral, illegal or fattening.

Quotes.author: Anton Chekhov
Quotes.quote: Doctors are just the same as lawyers; the only difference is that lawyers merely rob you, whereas doctors rob you and kill you too.

Quotes.author: Sir Arthur C. Clarke
Quotes.quote: I don’t believe in astrology; I’m a Sagittarius and we’re skeptical.

Quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant
Quotes.quote: My opinions may have changed, but not the fact that I’m right.

Quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant
Quotes.quote: To be sure of hitting the target, shoot first, and call whatever you hit the target.

Quotes.author: Bertrand Russell
Quotes.quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.

Quotes.author: Bill Vaughan
Quotes.quote: If there is anything the nonconformist hates worse than a conformist, it’s another nonconformist who doesn’t conform to the prevailing standard of nonconformity.

Quotes.author: Carl Sagan
Quotes.quote: But the fact that some geniuses were laughed at does not imply that all who are laughed at are geniuses. They laughed at Columbus, they laughed at Fulton, they laughed at the Wright Brothers. But they also laughed at Bozo the Clown.

Quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz
Quotes.quote: Don’t worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.

Quotes.author: Charles Wadsworth
Quotes.quote: By the time a man realizes that his father was right, he has a son who thinks he’s wrong.

Quotes.author: Clarence Darrow
Quotes.quote: When I was a boy I was told that anybody could become President. I’m beginning to believe it.

Quotes.author: Claude Pepper
Quotes.quote: A stockbroker urged me to buy a stock that would triple its value every year. I told him, ‘At my age, I don’t even buy green bananas.'

Quotes.author: Robert Mugabe
Quotes.quote: If you are a married man and find yourself attracted to school girls then just buy your wife a school uniform.
